Galaxy.title: Andromeda Galaxy (M31)
Galaxy.description: Andromeda Galaxy is located about 2.537 million light-years away from Earth and is the closest spiral galaxy to our Milky Way

Galaxy.title: Milky Way Galaxy
Galaxy.description: The Milky Way is the galaxy that contains our Solar System. It is estimated to be about 100,000â€“120,000 light-years in diameter.

Galaxy.title: Sombrero Galaxy (M104)
Galaxy.description: The Sombrero Galaxy is located about 28 million light-years away in the constellation Virgo.
